• Browser-based multiplayer mining game with real-time WebSocket communication.
  • Procedurally generated infinite map with various ore types and mining mechanics.
  • Mobile-optimized controls with virtual D-pad and action buttons.
  • Shop system for upgrades, repairs, and item purchases using in-game currency.
  • Save system with IndexedDB and cloud sync capabilities via Puter API.

MultiMiner is a real-time multiplayer mining game where players explore procedurally generated terrain, mine various ores, upgrade equipment, and trade with others. The game features cross-platform support with mobile controls, persistent save systems, and cloud synchronization through the Puter API. Players can join public rooms, build structures, and manage resources while competing on leaderboards.
